ingredients.item: 200g bag Waitrose Thick Cut Spring Greens

instructions.step: Place the lamb on a foil-lined grill pan under a preheated grill for 8-10 minutes turning once, or according to taste.

Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the peas and runner beans for 3 minutes. Add the spring greens, stock, mustard and mint sauce and simmer, covered for 3-4 minutes. Top with the lamb and serve with new potatoes.
